channel.title: Debugging help request — why are Persons breaking?
channel.description:
I have broken kepi's ActivityPub implementation somehow. At least, Mastodon isn't loading user pages any more. I can't see anything I changed that would make such a difference.
See e.g. https://marnanel.org/users/marnanel .
The preceding webfinger lookup works fine. The MIME types in Accept and Content-Type appear fine. Some of the Collections linked from that Person don't work properly at present, but they're never requested so it's not that.
I've been comparing this line by line with Mastodon's output of a Person, but I'm drawing a blank.
Any thoughts?

item.title: Debugging help request — why are Persons breaking?
item.dc:creator: marnanel
item.description:
@vpzom solved this: “publicKey” was returned as a string rather than an object.

Read full topic
item.source: Debugging help request — why are Persons breaking?

item.title: Debugging help request — why are Persons breaking?
item.dc:creator: marnanel
item.description:
I have broken kepi’s ActivityPub implementation somehow. At least, Mastodon isn’t loading user pages any more. I can’t see anything I changed that would make such a difference.

See e.g. https://marnanel.org/users/marnanel .

The preceding webfinger lookup works fine. The MIME types in Accept and Content-Type appear fine. Some of the Collections linked from that Person don’t work properly at present, but they’re never requested so it’s not that.

I’ve been comparing this line by line with Mastodon’s output of a Person, but I’m drawing a blank.

Any thoughts?
